arnas, zumbis modificados, muito sangue =  PERFEITO DEMAIS

Bom jogo, interessante apenas no modo versus.

Awesome game for the first time playing it. It's a short campaign(s), but worth the action and non-stopping hordes of zombies. If you played the Left For Dead 2 Demo, it is of the same quality equivalent. I recommend getting both L4D games as a bundle. It cost USD$15+tax
The beginning and end of a legend.
Still a blast after all these years!
Melhor jogo que eu ja joguei em toda a minha vida
The classic left 4 dead experience, what can I possibly say that hasn't been said before? If you haven't played this game you've missed out my friend.
sinceramente me encanto el juego, aun mas por los mods que se pueden poner a los personajes e infectados no pierde la emocion de jugarlo una y otra vez :)

Possibly too relentless for the less devout mouse-jockey, but it's astounding proof that being a brain-dead shooter is a very good thing.
Jogo da hora pra jogar com os amigos ou ate sozinho com os bots

Left 4 Dead 1 jest o wiele trudniejsze od Left 4 Dead 2 a mowa tu o tanku i np powtarzajƒÖcych siƒô specjalnych zombie np. 2 huntery 2 boomery i 2 smokery mogƒÖ ciƒô zaatakowaƒá jedocze≈õnie a i jest taki bug ≈ºe jak w tym samym czasie smoker i hunter ciƒô zaatakujƒÖ to bƒôdziesz lecia≈Ç po ca≈Çej mapie a≈º hunter ciƒô nie dobije ja taki przypadek mia≈Çem ponad 2 razy na kampani xD. Great playthrough. Awesome game to grind with your homies over the weekend.
a game that filled many hours of my day on console

You know, I got L4D2 free from Steam, and I've played it since Christmas 2013. I got quite few achievements and I really enjoyed the game, so I was curious what L4D1 was looking like. I have to say I didn't expect it to be the same game than L4D2 but with less weapons / monsters / levels, but actually, I still enjoyed spending 8$ on the version 1 because it run faster and better on lower hardware, so now, I can play L4D probably on my laptop and others computer while stay play the full version 2. 

I do recommend getting this version, but you need to know that it is the same game than the 2, but once again, it run faster, and I find the interface most slick, actually remind me of half-life :)
Bom jogo,mas fica melhor com amigos!

Left 4 Dead has somewhat been eclipsed by it's successor, Left 4 Dead 2, but there's still a lot of fun to be had with this title. If you are looking for a Left 4 Dead experience, you would probably be best suited to getting the sequel. 

With that said, this game will have a special place in my heart - the weapons are more pleasing to use and the simplicity of the game makes it that much more fun to play.

Left 4 Dead √© um excelente jogo de zumbi, trazendo um dos melhores jogos nesse cen√°rio apocal√≠ptico, sem frescura de zumbi extremamente lento como vemos em The Walking Dead e campanhas de tirar o f√¥lego e empolga absurdos.

O jogo, apesar de um grande marco, um pouco limitado, poucas armas de fogo e n√£o possuindo armas brancas, poucos zumbis especiais, esses deixam uma grande lembran√ßa para os jogadores e personagens bem carism√°ticos.

Hoje em dia, Left 4 Dead n√£o vale ser adquirido, devido ao lan√ßamento do Left 4 Dead 2, esse que possue em seu jogo todas as campanhas do seu antecessor. Eu indico comprar pela lembran√ßa, quando vier promo√ß√£o em pack.
Como su el 2 pero con menos gore y contenido

It is a bit weird to review a game released in 2008 eleven years later, yet I'd say that it is still a reference game for 4 players cooperation. Only the characters' move speed feels a bit slow, but apart from this you have fun and intensity, still feels great. To be played only in multiplayer though, the game loses most of its interest if you play alone.
This game was made by Valve who also operate Steam, which is unarguably the worst online video game distribution platform on the market.

The Campaign is awful.
There are not good audio settings, you can only low general, the music and thats all.

This is a great game that doesn't take itself all that serious, the weapons feel good. The atmosphere is dark and creepy like it should be. The zombies and special infected are great and well balanced. Very fun to play as them too. Coop or single player is great although the bots can be dumb. Plenty of custom campaigns to play. I personally prefer this one over the 2nd because of some smaller details. This game is faster paced, you can see your whole body when you look down, the physics seem to work better. The fov and weapon models feel better and so on. I highly recommend this game. One of the best coop experiences.
Excelente jogo, muito divertido tem um modo online versos e co-op, muito bom para jogar com amigos e conhecer pessoas novas. Recomendo a todas as pessoas que gostam de jogos de fps e zumbis
Both left 4 dead games are awesome and worth dying for, but left 4 dead 2 offers everything left 4 dead has. With a few add ons.
I'm not gonna lie tho, this game is actually fun. :)

E tem um ponto que eu acho muito bom ao meu ver, √© que n√£o tem como as pessoas te trolarem na gameplay, n√£o digo isso com  100% de certeza, por√©m, pelo que j√° joguei nunca vi ningu√©m zoando o outro e nem atrapalhando.
